English: lit. mustn't speak of two things on the same day (idiom); not to be mentioned in the same breath

h.b: ㄨㄟˋ　ㄎㄜˇ　ㄊㄨㄥˊ　ㄖˋ　ㄦˊ　ㄩˇ

d.f: `差別~`很~`大~，`不能~`相提並論~。`如~：「`當時~`的~`情形~`與~`現今~`不同~，`未可同日而語~。」`也~`作~「`不可同年而語~」、「`不可同日而語~」。

h.p: wèi kě tóng rì ér yǔ

English: lit. mustn't speak of two things on the same day (idiom); not to be mentioned in the same breath
